hdr-167106.def: Percentage of the population living below the international poverty line of $1.90 (in purchasing power parity terms [PPP] ) a day.
hdr-167106.name: Population living below income poverty line
hdr-167106.source: World Bank. 2021. World Development Indicators database. Washington, DC. Http://data.worldbank.org. Accessed July 8 2021.
